author: Reuters Editorial
title: Kremlin hopes for quick resolution to Armenian political crisis
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - The Kremlin said on Friday it hoped the political crisis in Armenia could be resolved as promptly as possible and with the consensus of all parties involved.
A close Russian ally, Armenia is in the middle of a political crisis after two weeks of anti-government protests that led to the resignation of Serzh Sarksyan as prime minister on Monday.
Reporting by Gabrielle TÃ©trault-Farber; writing by Maria Kiselyova
